trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeLib?displayProperty=fullName> instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeLib?displayProperty=fullName>改為。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about the `ITypeLib` interface, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib`介面，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: Finds occurrences of a type description in a type library.
trans-unit.target: 類型程式庫中尋找型別描述項的目。

trans-unit.source: There must be enough room in `rgMemId` to hold `pcFound` entries.
trans-unit.target: 必須有足夠的空間中`rgMemId`來保存`pcFound`項目。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::FindName`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::FindName`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The name to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A hash value to speed up the search, computed by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_LHashValOfNameSys" name="LHashValOfNameSys" href=""></xref> function.
trans-unit.target: 所計算的雜湊值，以加速搜尋<xref uid="langword_csharp_LHashValOfNameSys" name="LHashValOfNameSys" href=""></xref>函式。

trans-unit.source: If `lHashVal` is 0, a value is computed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`lHashVal`是 0，則在計算出的值。

trans-unit.source: On successful return, an array of pointers to the type descriptions that contain the name specified in `szNameBuf`.
trans-unit.target: 在成功傳回時，包含名稱中指定的型別描述指標的陣列`szNameBuf`。

trans-unit.source: An array of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MEMBERID" name="MEMBERID" href=""></xref> 's of the found items; `rgMemId` [i] is the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MEMBERID" name="MEMBERID" href=""></xref> that indexes into the type description specified by `ppTInfo` [i].
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref uid="langword_csharp_MEMBERID" name="MEMBERID" href=""></xref>的找到的項目。`rgMemId` [i] 是<xref uid="langword_csharp_MEMBERID" name="MEMBERID" href=""></xref>索引所指定的類型描述成`ppTInfo`[i]。

trans-unit.source: Cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 不能<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: On entry, indicates how many instances to look for.
trans-unit.target: 在項目，會指出要尋找的執行個體數目。

trans-unit.source: For example, `pcFound` = 1 can be called to find the first occurrence.
trans-unit.target: 例如， `pcFound` = 1 可以呼叫以尋找第一個出現項目。

trans-unit.source: The search stops when one instance is found.
trans-unit.target: 找到一個執行個體，就會停止搜尋。

trans-unit.source: On exit, indicates the number of instances that were found.
trans-unit.target: 結束時，表示找不到的執行個體數目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref uid="langword_csharp_in" name="in" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> values of `pcFound` are identical, there might be more type descriptions that contain the name.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_in" name="in" href=""></xref>和<xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref>值`pcFound`都是一樣的可能會有多個包含名稱的類型描述。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the library's documentation string, the complete Help file name and path, and the context identifier for the library Help topic in the Help file.
trans-unit.target: 擷取程式庫的文件字串、 完整的說明檔案名稱和路徑，以及程式庫的說明主題，說明檔中的內容識別項。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetDocumentation`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::GetDocumentation`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: Index of the type description whose documentation is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回其文件類型描述的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the name of the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含指定的項目名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the documentation string for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含指定的項目文件字串的字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Help context identifier associated with the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與指定的項目相關聯的說明內容識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the fully qualified name of the Help file.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，包含說明檔的完整的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the structure that contains the library's attributes.
trans-unit.target: 擷取包含程式庫屬性的結構。

trans-unit.source: The values of the structure referenced by `ppTLibAttr` can be obtained by <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 值所參考的結構`ppTLibAttr` <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure%2A>.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure%2A>可取得

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetTypeLibAttr`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::GetTypeLibAttr`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: On successful return, a structure that contains the library's attributes.
trans-unit.target: 在成功傳回時，包含程式庫屬性的結構。

trans-unit.source: Enables a client compiler to bind to a library's types, variables, constants, and global functions.
trans-unit.target: 可讓用戶端編譯器繫結至程式庫的類型、 變數、 常數和全域函式。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetTypeComp`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::GetTypeComp`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: On successful return, an instance of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_UCOMITypeComp" name="UCOMITypeComp" href=""></xref> instance for this <xref uid="langword_csharp_ITypeLib" name="ITypeLib" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在成功傳回時，執行個體<xref uid="langword_csharp_UCOMITypeComp" name="UCOMITypeComp" href=""></xref>這個執行個體<xref uid="langword_csharp_ITypeLib" name="ITypeLib" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified type description in the library.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定的型別描述文件庫中。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetTypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::GetTypeInfo`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: Index of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_UCOMITypeInfo" name="UCOMITypeInfo" href=""></xref> interface to return.
trans-unit.target: 索引的<xref uid="langword_csharp_UCOMITypeInfo" name="UCOMITypeInfo" href=""></xref>介面傳回。

trans-unit.source: On successful return, a <xref uid="langword_csharp_UCOMITypeInfo" name="UCOMITypeInfo" href=""></xref> describing the type referenced by `index`.
trans-unit.target: 在成功傳回時， <xref uid="langword_csharp_UCOMITypeInfo" name="UCOMITypeInfo" href=""> </xref>描述所參考的類型`index`。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of type descriptions in the type library.
trans-unit.target: 類型程式庫中傳回型別描述數目。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetTypeInfoCount`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::GetTypeInfoCount`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The number of type descriptions in the type library.
trans-unit.target: 類型程式庫中的類型描述數目。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the type description that corresponds to the specified GUID.
trans-unit.target: 擷取對應於指定之 GUID 的類型描述。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetTypeInfoOfGuid`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::GetTypeInfoOfGuid`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: IID of the interface of CLSID of the class whose type info is requested.
trans-unit.target: 這要求其型別資訊類別的 CLSID 介面的 IID。

trans-unit.source: On successful return, the requested <xref uid="langword_csharp_ITypeInfo" name="ITypeInfo" href=""></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 在成功傳回時，要求<xref uid="langword_csharp_ITypeInfo" name="ITypeInfo" href=""></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the type of a type description.
trans-unit.target: 擷取類型描述的型別。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetTypeInfoOfType`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::GetTypeInfoOfType`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The index of the type description within the type library.
trans-unit.target: 類型程式庫中的類型描述的索引。

trans-unit.source: Reference to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TYPEKIND" name="TYPEKIND" href=""></xref> enumeration for the type description.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref uid="langword_csharp_TYPEKIND" name="TYPEKIND" href=""></xref>列舉的類型描述。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a passed-in string contains the name of a type or member described in the library.
trans-unit.target: 指出傳入的字串，包含型別的名稱或程式庫中所述的成員。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::IsName`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::IsName`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The string to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的字串。

trans-unit.source: The hash value of `szNameBuf`.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊值`szNameBuf`。

trans-unit.source: if szNameBuf was found in the type library; otherwise .
trans-unit.target: 如果 szNameBuf 類型程式庫中找到，否則 。

trans-unit.source: Releases the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.TYPELIBATTR"></xref> originally obtained from <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMITypeLib.GetLibAttr*>.
trans-unit.target: 版本<xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.TYPELIBATTR"></xref>原本取自<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMITypeLib.GetLibAttr*>.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMITypeLib.GetLibAttr*>

trans-unit.source: For additional information about `ITypeLib::ReleaseTLibAttr`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`ITypeLib::ReleaseTLibAttr`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_TLIBATTR" name="TLIBATTR" href=""></xref> to release.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_TLIBATTR" name="TLIBATTR" href=""> </xref>釋放。
